Home.title: Discover Your
Home.description: where the future of architecture intertwines with sustainability to create transformative spaces. we are pioneers in crafting environments that enhance human interactions and respect our planet.

About.title: About
About.description1: The 100th floor company is a specialized establishment in general contracting, interior and exterior design, and the execution of decorative works. The company also provides comprehensive maintenance and cleaning services for buildings and public facilities. It was founded in [2025] in [Jeddah], aiming to deliver integrated, high-quality solutions that meet clients' needs across residential, commercial, and governmental sectors.
About.description2: Our mission is simple: to design spaces that inspire, function, and endure. We strive to meet the needs of today without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs. Our goal is to create buildings that not only stand the test of time but also contribute positively to their surroundings.
About.description3: We aspire to be a leading company in contracting, maintenance, and interior design across the Kingdom and the region, driven by innovation, quality, and unwavering commitment
About.exploreDescription: That harmonize everyday living with elegance and Eco-friendliness. From spacious family homes to compact urban residences.

Services.title: Architectural
Services.description: We deliver comprehensive and reliable services in contracting, design, maintenance, and cleaning, with a strong commitment to client satisfaction and adherence to the highest standards of quality and safety across all our projects.

carousel.interiorDesign: Design and Execution of Decoration Works
carousel.construction: Cleaning of Buildings and Public Facilities

interiorDesignFeatures.feature2: Flooring, wallpaper, and decorative lighting installation
interiorDesignFeatures.feature3: Implementation of suspended ceilings and gypsum

constructionFeatures.feature2: Cleaning of factories, schools, and hospitals
constructionFeatures.feature3: Cleaning of residential and commercial buildings

planningFeatures.feature2: Execution of governmental projects and infrastructure
planningFeatures.feature3: Construction of villas, residential and commercial buildings

Portfolio.title: Checkout Our
Portfolio.description: Join us in exploring spaces designed not just for today, but for a sustainable tomorrow.
